Name: 0_covid_vaccine_people_just
Representative_Docs: ['>>504649906How retarded does someone have to be to believe this? I saw this earlier and I genuinely didnt even realize what it was implying. Its not until now, my second time seeing it, that people are implying that the AstraZeneca vaccine is actually a secret code word in Latin which is supposed to be broadcasting sinister intent. Its sad for two reasons, first because its such obvious bullshit and Latin doesnt look anything like that, but also because the COVID vaccine was actually harmful, and it wasnt very effective, but because retards are pushing the idea that it kills people and is some intentional satanic plot, nobody will take the real issue seriously, that being that greedy corporations used our government to sell their own harmful, ineffective product which they falsely claimed to the public was not inly safe, effective, but also borderline necessary, and did not quietly admit that the vaccine does pose health risks until years later, and it barely got any news coverage. This is why I dont identify as anti-vaxx, because most vaccines are genuinely amazing, as well as being generally harmless except for a very small percentage of the population with particular genetic traits. That being said, every vaccine has advantages and disadvantages, and I believe everyone should do research on the vaccines they are considering, and pick and choose which ones they deem necessary based on their own personal factors, risk to benefit ratio, and lifestyle choices, but because a bunch of retarded schizophrenic Q followers who believe the Annunaki built the pyramids go around telling people not to give your kids the polio vaccine because it will give them autism, or that the COVID vaxx has microchips and will kill you, nobody takes me seriously when I say that the whole COVID vaccine fiasco represents a serious threat to public health', '>>505153113Count yourself lucky you weren\'t in Australia during the scamdemic. It actually makes me angry how everyone and their mother turned against me.I couldn\'t rent places because everyone wanted to see my vaccine passport.I was fired from my job because I could no longer attend the office.I was barred from going to stores. They had "guards" who would check that your vaccine passport was current before letting you in.I was locked in my house and wasn\'t allowed out while vaccinated people were. $5,000 fine for leaving my front door.I wasn\'t even able to get a haircut for like 2 years, just because the government said barbers and hairdressers are high-risk covid hotspots.I lost friends and family because they thought I was insane and would laugh at me behind my back. And sometimes tell me they did so, just to try and shame me into getting the was absolute hell in Australia for the unvaccinated, and I will never, ever forgive the people of this country for doing that to me. I have zero loyalty to this country now and I wish a slow and painful death on all those who played into this fucking this play out in real time shattered my faith in humanity.', '>>506028345everything is the vaxxand before that everything was "covid"']

Name: 9_5g_cloud_ngo_able
Representative_Docs: ['>>505576178The internet is proof that we are able to build an artificial consciousness. All data and all memories are shared in the cloud. Any machine connected to this cloud is able to fetch whatever data whenever it wants from this cloud we can also remotely communicate. We are only restricted by the speed we type our messages in, but the machines send this info to the receiver almost of Things is the collective unconscious of the machines. The machines are able to interact with each other without the need for an external command prompt (i.e. a human telling the machine to notice another machine or transmit data to it). Botnet might sound like a familiar transhumanists are building this same collective unconscious for humans - the Internet of Bodies. The usual suspects are to blame."Covid" was the catalyst for the IoB. It was all planned from the get-go and the vaccine was always the reason for this event. The vaccine is known to contain nanographeneoxide (NGO), which is able to interact with electromagnetic fields (EMF).
